mapper.select:
SELECT DISTINCT(dbt4021."hihokenshaNo") FROM rgdb."DbT4021ShiharaiHohoHenko" AS dbt4021 INNER JOIN rgdb."DbT4024ShiharaiHohoHenkoSashitome" AS dbt4024 ON dbt4021."shoKisaiHokenshaNo"=dbt4024."shoKisaiHokenshaNo" AND dbt4021."hihokenshaNo"=dbt4024."hihokenshaNo" AND dbt4021."kanriKubun"=dbt4024."kanriKubun" AND dbt4021."rirekiNo"=dbt4024."rirekiNo" LEFT JOIN( SELECT dbv2002."hihokenshaNo" hihokenshaNo, urt0705."shunoId" shunoId, urt0705."nokigenYMD" nokigenYMD, urt0705."choteigaku" choteigaku FROM rgdb."DbV2002Fuka" AS dbv2002 INNER JOIN rgdb."DbT2003Kibetsu" AS dbt2003 ON dbv2002."choteiNendo"=dbt2003."choteiNendo" AND dbv2002."fukaNendo"=dbt2003."fukaNendo" AND dbv2002."tsuchishoNo"=dbt2003."tsuchishoNo" AND dbv2002."rirekiNo"=dbt2003."rirekiNo" INNER JOIN rgdb."UrT0705ChoteiKyotsu" as urt0705 ON dbt2003."choteiId"=urt0705."choteiId" LEFT JOIN( SELECT dbt4023_meisai.* FROM rgdb."DbT4023JikoKisambiKanri" dbt4023_meisai INNER JOIN( SELECT tmpdbt4023."hihokenshaNo", tmpdbt4023."choteiNendo", tmpdbt4023."fukaNendo", tmpdbt4023."tokucho_FuchoKubun", tmpdbt4023."tsuchishoNo", tmpdbt4023."shuno_Ki_Tsuki", MAX( tmpdbt4023."jikoKisanYMD") jikoKisanYMD FROM rgdb."DbT4023JikoKisambiKanri" tmpdbt4023 WHERE tmpdbt4023."tokucho_FuchoKubun" = '2' GROUP BY tmpdbt4023."hihokenshaNo", tmpdbt4023."choteiNendo", tmpdbt4023."fukaNendo", tmpdbt4023."tokucho_FuchoKubun", tmpdbt4023."tsuchishoNo", tmpdbt4023."shuno_Ki_Tsuki" ) dbt4023_max ON dbt4023_max."hihokenshaNo" = dbt4023_meisai."hihokenshaNo" AND dbt4023_max."choteiNendo" = dbt4023_meisai."choteiNendo" AND dbt4023_max."fukaNendo" = dbt4023_meisai."fukaNendo" AND dbt4023_max."tokucho_FuchoKubun" = dbt4023_meisai."tokucho_FuchoKubun" AND dbt4023_max."tsuchishoNo" = dbt4023_meisai."tsuchishoNo" AND dbt4023_max."shuno_Ki_Tsuki" = dbt4023_meisai."shuno_Ki_Tsuki" AND dbt4023_max.jikoKisanYMD = dbt4023_meisai."jikoKisanYMD" ) dbt4023 ON dbv2002."hihokenshaNo" = dbt4023."hihokenshaNo" AND dbv2002."choteiNendo" = dbt4023."choteiNendo" AND dbv2002."fukaNendo" = dbt4023."fukaNendo" AND dbv2002."tsuchishoNo" = dbt4023."tsuchishoNo" AND to_char(dbt2003.ki, '999') = dbt4023."shuno_Ki_Tsuki" AND dbt2003."choshuHouhou" = dbt4023."tokucho_FuchoKubun" WHERE dbt2003."choshuHouhou" = '2' ) shunojoho ON dbt4021."hihokenshaNo" = shunojoho.hihokenshaNo LEFT JOIN( SELECT tmpcat0701."shunoId", SUM(tmpcat0701.shunyugaku) shunyugaku FROM rgca."CaT0701Shunyu" tmpcat0701 WHERE tmpcat0701."shunyuYMD" <= #{基準日} AND tmpcat0701."sokuhoKubun" = FALSE GROUP BY tmpcat0701."shunoId" ) cat0701 ON shunojoho.shunoId = cat0701."shunoId" WHERE
dbt4021."kanriKubun" IN ('1','2') AND dbt4021."logicalDeletedFlag" = false
dbt4021."kanriKubun" = '1' AND dbt4021."torokuKubun" = '01' AND dbt4021."logicalDeletedFlag" = false
dbt4021."kanriKubun" = '1' AND dbt4021."torokuKubun" = '01' AND dbt4021."logicalDeletedFlag" = false AND (dbt4021."yokoku_TsuchiHakkoYMD" IS NULL OR dbt4021."yokoku_TsuchiHakkoYMD" = '') AND dbt4021."yokoku_TsuchiSaiHakkoFlag" = true
dbt4021."kanriKubun" = '1' AND dbt4021."torokuKubun" = '01' AND dbt4021."logicalDeletedFlag" = false AND (dbt4021."yokoku_TsuchiHakkoYMD" IS NULL OR dbt4021."yokoku_TsuchiHakkoYMD" = '')

dbt4021."kanriKubun" = '1' AND dbt4021."torokuKubun" = '02' AND dbt4021."logicalDeletedFlag" = false

dbt4021."kanriKubun" = '1' AND dbt4021."torokuKubun" = '02' AND dbt4021."logicalDeletedFlag" = false AND (dbt4021."yokoku_TsuchiHakkoYMD" IS NULL OR dbt4021."yokoku_TsuchiHakkoYMD" = '')
dbt4021."kanriKubun" = '1' AND dbt4021."torokuKubun" = '02' AND dbt4021."logicalDeletedFlag" = false AND dbt4021."yokoku_TsuchiHakkoYMD" IS NOT NULL AND dbt4021."yokoku_TsuchiHakkoYMD" != ''
dbt4021."kanriKubun" = '2' AND dbt4021."torokuKubun" = '11' AND dbt4021."logicalDeletedFlag" = false
dbt4021."kanriKubun" = '2' AND dbt4021."torokuKubun" = '11' AND dbt4021."logicalDeletedFlag" = false AND (dbt4021."yokoku_TsuchiHakkoYMD" IS NULL OR dbt4021."yokoku_TsuchiHakkoYMD" = '')
dbt4021."kanriKubun" = '2' AND dbt4021."torokuKubun" = '11' AND dbt4021."logicalDeletedFlag" = false AND (dbt4021."yokoku_TsuchiHakkoYMD" IS NULL OR dbt4021."yokoku_TsuchiHakkoYMD" = '')
dbt4021."kanriKubun" = '2' AND dbt4021."torokuKubun" = '11' AND dbt4021."logicalDeletedFlag" = false AND (dbt4021."yokoku_TsuchiHakkoYMD" IS NULL OR dbt4021."yokoku_TsuchiHakkoYMD" = '') AND #{基準日減変更期限} <= shunojoho.nokigenYMD AND shunojoho.nokigenYMD <= #{基準日} AND tmpcat0701.shunyugaku < shunojoho.choteigaku

dbt4021."kanriKubun" = '2' AND dbt4021."torokuKubun" = '12' AND dbt4021."logicalDeletedFlag" = false AND (dbt4021."yokoku_TsuchiHakkoYMD" IS NULL OR dbt4021."yokoku_TsuchiHakkoYMD" = '')

dbt4021."kanriKubun" = '2' AND dbt4021."torokuKubun" = '12' AND dbt4021."logicalDeletedFlag" = false AND dbt4024."johoBunruiKubun" = '1' AND dbt4024."logicalDeletedFlag" = false AND dbt4024."sashitomeKojoJotaiKubun" = '01' AND (dbt4024."sashitomeKojoNo" IS NULL OR dbt4024."sashitomeKojoNo"='') AND #{基準日減変更期限} <= shunojoho.nokigenYMD AND shunojoho.nokigenYMD <= #{基準日} AND tmpcat0701.shunyugaku < shunojoho.choteigaku

dbt4021."kanriKubun" = '2' AND dbt4021."torokuKubun" = '12' AND dbt4021."logicalDeletedFlag" = false AND dbt4024."johoBunruiKubun" = '2' AND dbt4024."logicalDeletedFlag" = false AND dbt4024."sashitomeKojoJotaiKubun" = '01' AND (dbt4024."sashitomeKojoNo" IS NULL OR dbt4024."sashitomeKojoNo"='') AND #{基準日減変更期限} <= shunojoho.nokigenYMD AND shunojoho.nokigenYMD <= #{基準日} AND tmpcat0701.shunyugaku < shunojoho.choteigaku
ORDER BY #{出力順}

SELECT tmptable."hihokenshaNo" as "tmp_hihokenshano", shikakujoho.*, , shunojoho.*, atena.*, shunyu.*, cat1018tokusokujo.* FROM "TaishoshaJohoTempTable" tmptable rgdb."DbT1001HihokenshaDaicho" tmptable INNER JOIN( SELECT , urt0508."shikibetsuCode" shikakujoho_shikibetsucode FROM rgdb."DbT1001HihokenshaDaicho" LEFT JOIN rgur."UrT0508SeikatsuHogoJukyusha" urt0508 ON "DbT1001HihokenshaDaicho"."shikibetsuCode" = urt0508."shikibetsuCode" ) shikakujoho ON tmptable."hihokenshaNo" = shikakujoho."dbT1001HihokenshaDaicho_hihokenshaNo" INNER JOIN rgdb."DbV4001JukyushaDaicho" "DbT4001JukyushaDaicho" ON tmptable."hihokenshaNo" = "DbT4001JukyushaDaicho"."hihokenshaNo" LEFT JOIN( SELECT , , , jikokisambikanri.* FROM rgdb."DbV2002Fuka" "DbT2002Fuka" INNER JOIN rgdb."DbT2003Kibetsu" "DbT2003Kibetsu" ON "DbT2002Fuka"."choteiNendo" = "DbT2003Kibetsu"."choteiNendo" AND "DbT2002Fuka"."fukaNendo" = "DbT2003Kibetsu"."fukaNendo" AND "DbT2002Fuka"."tsuchishoNo" = "DbT2003Kibetsu"."tsuchishoNo" AND "DbT2002Fuka"."rirekiNo" = "DbT2003Kibetsu"."rirekiNo" INNER JOIN rgdb."UrT0705ChoteiKyotsu" ON "DbT2003Kibetsu"."choteiId"="UrT0705ChoteiKyotsu"."choteiId" LEFT JOIN( SELECT
FROM rgdb."DbT4023JikoKisambiKanri" INNER JOIN( SELECT tmpdbt4023."hihokenshaNo", tmpdbt4023."choteiNendo", tmpdbt4023."fukaNendo", tmpdbt4023."tokucho_FuchoKubun", tmpdbt4023."tsuchishoNo", tmpdbt4023."shuno_Ki_Tsuki", MAX(tmpdbt4023."jikoKisanYMD") jikoKisanYMD FROM rgdb."DbT4023JikoKisambiKanri" tmpdbt4023 WHERE tmpdbt4023."tokucho_FuchoKubun" = '2' GROUP BY tmpdbt4023."hihokenshaNo", tmpdbt4023."choteiNendo", tmpdbt4023."fukaNendo", tmpdbt4023."tokucho_FuchoKubun", tmpdbt4023."tsuchishoNo", tmpdbt4023."shuno_Ki_Tsuki" ) maxdbt4023 ON maxdbt4023."hihokenshaNo"="DbT4023JikoKisambiKanri"."hihokenshaNo" AND maxdbt4023."choteiNendo"="DbT4023JikoKisambiKanri"."choteiNendo" AND maxdbt4023."fukaNendo"="DbT4023JikoKisambiKanri"."fukaNendo" AND maxdbt4023."tsuchishoNo"="DbT4023JikoKisambiKanri"."tsuchishoNo" AND maxdbt4023."shuno_Ki_Tsuki"="DbT4023JikoKisambiKanri"."shuno_Ki_Tsuki" AND maxdbt4023."tokucho_FuchoKubun"="DbT4023JikoKisambiKanri"."tokucho_FuchoKubun" AND maxdbt4023.jikoKisanYMD="DbT4023JikoKisambiKanri"."jikoKisanYMD" ) jikokisambikanri ON "DbT2002Fuka"."hihokenshaNo" = jikokisambikanri."dbT4023JikoKisambiKanri_hihokenshaNo" AND "DbT2002Fuka"."choteiNendo" = jikokisambikanri."dbT4023JikoKisambiKanri_choteiNendo" AND "DbT2002Fuka"."fukaNendo" = jikokisambikanri."dbT4023JikoKisambiKanri_fukaNendo" AND "DbT2002Fuka"."tsuchishoNo" = jikokisambikanri."dbT4023JikoKisambiKanri_tsuchishoNo" AND to_char("DbT2003Kibetsu".ki, '999') = jikokisambikanri."dbT4023JikoKisambiKanri_shuno_Ki_Tsuki" AND "DbT2003Kibetsu"."choshuHouhou" = jikokisambikanri."dbT4023JikoKisambiKanri_tokucho_FuchoKubun" WHERE "DbT2003Kibetsu"."choshuHouhou" = '2' ) shunojoho ON tmptable."hihokenshaNo" = shunojoho."dbT2002Fuka_hihokenshaNo" LEFT JOIN( SELECT cat1018meisai."shunoId" as "caT1018TokusokuHakkoRireki_shunoId", cat1018meisai."tokusokujoHakkoYMD" as "caT1018TokusokuHakkoRireki_tokusokujoHakkoYMD" FROM rgca."CaT1018TokusokuHakkoRireki" cat1018meisai INNER JOIN( SELECT cat1018tmp."shunoId", MAX(cat1018tmp."tokusokujoHakkoYMD") tokusokujoHakkoYMD FROM rgca."CaT1018TokusokuHakkoRireki" cat1018tmp WHERE cat1018tmp."tokusokujoHakkoYMD" <= #{rDate基準日} GROUP BY cat1018tmp."shunoId" )cat1018max ON cat1018meisai."shunoId" = cat1018max."shunoId" AND cat1018meisai."tokusokujoHakkoYMD" = cat1018max.tokusokujoHakkoYMD ) cat1018tokusokujo ON shunojoho."urT0705ChoteiKyotsu_shunoId" = cat1018tokusokujo."caT1018TokusokuHakkoRireki_shunoId" LEFT JOIN( SELECT cat0701meisai."shunyuId" as "caT0701Shunyu_shunyuId", cat0701meisai."shunoId" as "caT0701Shunyu_shunoId", cat0701meisai.shunyugaku as "caT0701Shunyu_shunyugaku", cat0701meisai."shunyuYMD" as "caT0701Shunyu_shunyuYMD" FROM rgca."CaT0701Shunyu" cat0701meisai WHERE cat0701meisai."shunyuYMD" <= #{rDate基準日} AND cat0701meisai."sokuhoKubun" = FALSE ) shunyu ON shunojoho."urT0705ChoteiKyotsu_shunoId" = shunyu."caT0701Shunyu_shunyuId" INNER JOIN rgua."UaFt200FindShikibetsuTaisho"('2',#{flexibleDate基準日},TRUE,'DB',FALSE,'','','','','','','','','','','',FALSE,'','','','','','','',FALSE,'','','','','','','','','','','',FALSE,FALSE,FALSE,FALSE,FALSE,FALSE,FALSE,FALSE,FALSE,FALSE,FALSE,'','','','','','','','',FALSE,'','',FALSE,FALSE,FALSE,'','','','','','','','','','','','','','','','','','','{}') atena ON atena."shikibetsuCode" = shikakujoho.shikakujoho_shikibetsucode ORDER BY tmptable."hihokenshaNo", shunojoho."dbT2003Kibetsu_choteiNendo", shunojoho."dbT2003Kibetsu_fukaNendo", shunojoho."dbT2003Kibetsu_tsuchishoNo", shunojoho."dbT2003Kibetsu_ki"
